verb.definition: To adopt a vegetarian diet (informal/constructed usage)
verb.example: They decided to vegetarian after watching the documentary on animal welfare.

noun.definition: A person who does not eat meat, and sometimes other animal products, especially for health or ethical reasons
noun.example: She has been a vegetarian for five years.

usage_examples: As a vegetarian, he always checks menus for meat‑free options.
Many people choose to become a vegetarian for health or environmental reasons.
